## CertExpirationInfo interface

Certificate expiration information based on the cert expiration date and a renewal window based in business days

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface CertExpirationInfo 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [businessDaysBuffer](./devcert-patched.certexpirationinfo.businessdaysbuffer.md) | <code>number</code> | Number of business days before cert expiry before we consider a cert to be "expiring" |
|  [expireAt](./devcert-patched.certexpirationinfo.expireat.md) | <code>Date</code> | The date at which a given cert will \_expire\_ at which point it will not be suitable for use |
|  [freshness](./devcert-patched.certexpirationinfo.freshness.md) | <code>CertFreshnessState</code> | An indication of whether a certificate is expiring, already expired, or suitable for use ("fresh") |
|  [mustRenew](./devcert-patched.certexpirationinfo.mustrenew.md) | <code>boolean</code> |  |
|  [renewBy](./devcert-patched.certexpirationinfo.renewby.md) | <code>Date</code> | The date at which a given certificate will be deemed to be "expiring soon" at which point it should be automatically renewed |
